name: Publication Certification
description: Validates that the Publish Artifact Orchestrator has run all domain audits and produced a GO or CONDITIONAL certification

any_of.description: Publication certification report with GO/CONDITIONAL/NO-GO status

validations.description: Publication certification or approval report must exist

notes: G8 validates the aggregate pre-publication audit. The Publish Artifact Orchestrator invokes: Bibliography Orchestrator (audit mode), Audit Orchestrator (quality domains), Social Media Meta Expert, SEO Audit Agent, and Gate Guard Auditor (G1-G7 verification). If issues are found, QA Remediation Orchestrator runs first. Certification status must be GO or CONDITIONAL to proceed to G9.
